block.p: * Excite@Home, Redwood City, Calif., an Internet company that combines online content and navigational services, to Gillespie, Lawrenceville, N.J., part of the Interpublic Group of Companies., to handle its direct marketing, which had been at Lowe Fox Pavlika, part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic. Billings were estimated at $5 million. * Rug Doctor, Plano, Tex., a provider of carpet cleaning products and rental machines, to Levenson & Hill, Dallas, to handle its account, which had been inactive. Billings were estimated at more than $2 million. * Roper Starch Worldwide, New York, a research company, to Heitner Weiss, New York, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at $1 million.

* Excite@Home, Redwood City, Calif., an Internet company that combines online content and navigational services, to Gillespie, Lawrenceville, N.J., part of the Interpublic Group of Companies., to handle its direct marketing, which had been at Lowe Fox Pavlika, part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic. Billings were estimated at $5 million. * Rug Doctor, Plano, Tex., a provider of carpet cleaning products and rental machines, to Levenson & Hill, Dallas, to handle its account, which had been inactive. Billings were estimated at more than $2 million. * Roper Starch Worldwide, New York, a research company, to Heitner Weiss, New York, to handle its first account. Billings were estimated at $1 million.
